article.class: vcex-recent-news-entry clr no-left-padding post-8433 post type-post status-publish format-image hentry category-coronavirus category-news post_format-post-format-image entry no-media

h2.a: John Rex will start food service on April 7 from 9 to 11 a.m​.

div.p: EVERY child in EVERY John Rex family ages 0-18 can receive both breakfast and lunch for FREE. Everyone has experienced a loss during this time in some form or another. One way John Rex can help support your family is by providing breakfast and lunch. We REALLY hope everyone will take advantage of this service!…

div.div:
